page.title: 11YOUNG CHILDREN's HOBBIES
page.content: Some children said:- {I go to the Marian Jepson's dancing {class in Oldham for modern and ballet. {I like dancing because it gets you fit {and sometimes it's funny. My hobby is collecting bookmarks. I have 39 in all. I have got bookmarks from Scotland, Wales, England and Buxton. I have a few old ones including one of the Lord's supper. {My hobby is playing the piano. I have {my music lesson every Tuesday for a {half hour but my lesson usually takes {longer because my mum talks for about {10 minutes while she drinks her tea. I like motorbikes because I have got a 50cc Italjet. It goes about 45 mph. My favourite place has been banned because they are building houses there and the police have warned us it is private land.
